title: Vectorised scenario construction — calcDriver
text: driver string designating driver. Available drivers : GDP Population GDPpc Labour Urban scenario string (vector strings) designating scenario(s) returned. Use toolGetScenarioDefinition() learn scenarios available. popAsWeight TRUE, population data scenario used weight. naming string giving naming scheme data dimension. Can either: "indicator_scenario" (default): Returns names type "gdp_SSP2", "pop_SSP2". "indicator.scenario": Returns names type "gdp.SSP2", "pop.SSP2". "scenario": Returns names type "SSP2". Set naming "scenario" want operate SSP2 gdp population data instance, worry conflicting names. extension2150 string specifying /scenarios extended 2150. Can either: "bezier" (default): bezier curve extension leads smooth flattening scenario: slope last year scenario halved 2150. Currently works scenarios 2100 last year. "constant": last value scenarios taken constant 2150. "none": extension. ... Arguments passed calcScenarioConstructor harmonization string designating harmonization function. pastData string passed calc'Driver'Past function, e.g. calcGDPPast() calcPopulationPast(). futureData string passed calc'Driver'Future function, e.g. calcGDPFuture() calcPopulationFuture().

title: Harmonization tool Past — toolHarmonizePast
text: Like harmonization tools mrdrivers, toolHarmonizePast takes two magpie objects, 'past' 'future', returns single magpie object, .e. harmonized time-series. case, harmonized time-series always equal 'past', years 'past'. harmonized time-series depends 'method' argument chosen.

title: Harmonization tool Past — toolHarmonizePast
text: past magpie object one scenario/datatype, .e. length third dimension 1. future magpie object. method string defining harmonization method: "level": harmonized time-series exactly equal 'future' years last year 'past'. "growth": harmonized time-series follows growth rates 'future', years last year 'past'. "transition": harmonized time-series transitions 'future' year 'yEnd'. yEnd, harmonized time-series equal 'future'. transition phase, share absolute difference past' future' last year past' added future. share starts 1 last year 'past' decreases linearly 0 yEnd. yEnd Additional input "transition" method. Year transition period completed.

title: Harmonization tool Past — toolHarmonizePast
text: magpie object dimensions 'future'.

title: Harmonization tool Past — toolHarmonizePast
text: 'future' object multiple scenarios/datatypes, .e. length third dimension larger 1, harmonized time-series created every scenario/datatype future. 'past' object used every case - hence requirement 'past' one scenario/datatype.
